text: Saint-Sauveur-sur-Tinée is a commune in the Alpes-Maritimes department in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region in southeastern France. ==Population== Its inhabitants are called Blavets or Sansavornins. ==See also== *Communes of the Alpes-Maritimes department ==References== Category:Communes of Alpes-Maritimes Category:Alpes-Maritimes communes articles needing translation from French Wikipedia
title: Saint-Sauveur-sur-Tinée
